sentence: Thursday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index 39.39 This is the 3rd straight day of increase for the index.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.08 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 1.6 to 1 ratio.
There were 1771 advancers and 1107 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 179 stocks reached a 52 week high and 20 reaching lows.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .72% for the day; a total of 34.32 points.
Cisco Systems, Inc. ( CSCO ) had the largest percent change down (-4.81%) while NetApp, Inc. ( NTAP ) had the largest percent change gain rising 6.25%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .19% for the day; a total of 35.68 points.
Cisco Systems, Inc. ( CSCO ) had the largest percent change down (-4.81%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.87%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
